Package it.polimi.it.network.client

Class GUIHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.it.view.GUI.GUIHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewInterface
public class GUIHandler extends Object implements ViewInterface
Class that manages the communication between the server and the client that choose GUI

    • recover

      public void recover(int gameID, Tile[][] matrix, ArrayList<Tile[][]> shelfies, int id1, int id2, PersonalGoalCard personalGoalCard, ArrayList<Integer> points, List<String> playerList)
      Forces a GUI update after the reconnection to the game
      Specified by:
      recover in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      gameID - is the gameID of the game that the player just reconnected to.
      matrix - is the LivingRoom Board
      shelfies - is a List of the Players' Shelfies
      id1 - is the first CommonGoalCard
      id2 - is the second CommonGoalCard
      personalGoalCard - is the player's PersonaleGoalCard
      points - is the list of the players' points
      playerList - is the list of the players, ordered as their turns are.
